title: Migration: the first week
creator_credit: David Corke, Ken J. Widdowson and Educational Media Australia
brief_description: In this film the Rata family are seen arriving in Australia and settling into a hostel. The problems encountered in their first week include finding employment, enrolling the children in school and child care centres and coping with the language barrier.
creator_credit_for_label: David Corke, Ken J. Widdowson and Educational Media Australia
